title: `datalad get` got stuck
body:
could be a problem deeper (git-annex) but I think it is more likely our stdout/stderr handling by Runner
```shell
smaug:/mnt/btrfs/scrap/tmp
$> datalad install -g http://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds001734
[INFO   ] Cloning http://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds001734 [1 other candidates] into '/mnt/btrfs/scrap/tmp/ds001734'
[INFO   ]   Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore
[INFO   ] access to 1 dataset sibling s3-PRIVATE not auto-enabled, enable with:
|               datalad siblings -d "/mnt/btrfs/scrap/tmp/ds001734" enable -s s3-PRIVATE
install(ok): /mnt/btrfs/scrap/tmp/ds001734 (dataset)
Total (33126 ok, 420 failed out of 41492):  10%|██▌                      | 95.1G/915G [24:40<16:54:37, 13.5MB/s]

derivatives/freesurfer/sub-098/label/lh.BA4p_exvivo.label:   0%|                     | 0.00/131k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-098/label/lh.BA4a_exvivo.label:   0%|                     | 0.00/198k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-098/label/lh.BA6_exvivo.label:   0%|                      | 0.00/478k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-098/label/lh.BA_exvivo.annot:   0%|                      | 0.00/1.14M [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub- .. l/lh.BA_exvivo.thresh.annot:   0%|                   | 0.00/1.14M [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub- .. lh.BA4a_exvivo.thresh.label:   0%|                   | 0.00/83.0k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub- .. uch/rh.final_surfaces.touch:   0%|                     | 0.00/135 [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-097/surf/rh.sphere:   0%|                                | 0.00/5.17M [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-097/surf/rh.volume:   0%|                                 | 0.00/574k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-097/label/rh.BA1_exvivo.label:   0%|                      | 0.00/127k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-090/surf/rh.smoothwm.FI.crv:   0%|                        | 0.00/579k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/freesurfer/sub-090/surf/rh.smoothwm.K1.crv:   0%|                        | 0.00/579k [00:00<?, ?B/s]
derivatives/fmriprep/sub-08 .. ask-MGT_run-01_bold_bbr.svg:   0%|                   | 0.00/2.96M [00:00<?, ?B/s]
```

<details>
<summary>there is over 30 `git` processes started by our datalad process ATM</summary> 

```shell
     1	yoh      2934138  2.2  0.0 435000 129224 pts/9   Sl+  08:15   2:00       /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/datalad install -g http://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds001734
```
